UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores user profile information, including preferences and health conditions.

healthConditions.description: Any health conditions the user has specified, e.g., 'asthma'.

deviceToken.description: FCM device token for push notifications.

ChatHistory.title: Chat History
ChatHistory.description: Represents a single message in a chat session with EcoBot.

content.description: The text content of the message.

Alert.title: Alert
Alert.description: Represents a health or environmental alert sent to a user.

uid.description: The ID of the user who received the alert.

message.description: The content of the alert message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the alert was generated.

BlogPost.title: Blog Post
BlogPost.description: A blog post created by a community member.

Article.title: Article
Article.description: An in-depth article or research piece by a community member.

DataUpload.title: Data Upload
DataUpload.description: A link to a dataset or data source shared by a user.

/users/{uid}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{uid}/chatHistory/{messageId}.description: Stores the chat history for each user with the EcoBot assistant.

/alerts/{alertId}.description: Stores all alerts generated for all users.

/blogPosts/{postId}.description: Collection of all blog posts from the community.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Collection of all articles from the community.

/dataUploads/{uploadId}.description: Collection of all user-submitted data sources.
